attributes.action: Seriously consider a review of the voting and condsideration of lowering the age of voting from 18 to 16
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Young people are now considered to be an influential voice in the United Kingdom. But how can young people be considered an influential group in society when they do not get their say in general elections, Local elections or Referendums. There has been a lot said about whether the voting age should be lowered or not but no serious debate or discussion. Now is the time to have that debate and discussion.
